title: Replace all website images with attractive ones

requirements.summary: Replace hero section background image with an elegant Indian ethnic fashion themed image featuring rich colors and traditional textile patterns
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays a visually appealing background image that complements the Indian ethnic fashion theme
Image maintains appropriate dimensions for hero section display
Image integrates seamlessly with existing hero section text overlay

file_operations.description: Update the HeroSection component to reference the new hero background image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-background.dim_1920x1080.png. Replace the current backgroundImageUrl usage to use the generated static asset path. Ensure the background image renders correctly with the existing text overlay and maintains responsive behavior.

requirements.summary: Replace category preview images on home page with attractive generated images for Sarees, Western Dresses, Lehenga, and Jewellery sections
acceptanceCriteria: Each category preview card displays a distinct, high-quality representative image
Images clearly represent their respective product categories
All four category images maintain visual consistency in style and quality

file_operations.description: Update the category preview cards to use the newly generated category images from frontend/public/assets/generated/. Replace the image paths for each category: Sarees should use category-sarees.dim_400x300.png, Western Dresses should use category-western-dresses.dim_400x300.png, Lehenga should use category-lehenga.dim_400x300.png, and Jewellery should use category-jewellery.dim_400x300.png. Ensure all four category cards render the new images correctly while maintaining existing navigation functionality.

requirements.summary: Replace product card fallback images with category-specific generated images for Sarees, Western Dresses, Lehenga, and Jewellery
acceptanceCriteria: Each category has a dedicated fallback image when product-specific images are unavailable
Fallback images are visually appealing and accurately represent their product categories
ProductCard component correctly displays category-specific fallback images

file_operations.description: Update the ProductCard component to use the newly generated category-specific fallback images from frontend/public/assets/generated/. Map each product category to its corresponding fallback image: sarees to fallback-sarees.dim_300x400.png, westernDresses to fallback-western-dresses.dim_300x400.png, lehenga to fallback-lehenga.dim_300x400.png, and jewellery to fallback-jewellery.dim_300x400.png. Replace the existing fallback image logic to reference these static assets based on the product's category property.

requirements.summary: Verify all generated images are correctly integrated and rendering as static assets across the application
acceptanceCriteria: HeroSection component references the new hero background image
Home page category preview cards use the new category images
ProductCard component uses the new category-specific fallback images
All images load correctly from the static assets directory

file_operations.description: Verify that the Home page correctly renders all newly integrated images: the hero background via HeroSection component and all four category preview card images. Ensure image paths resolve correctly from frontend/public/assets/generated/ and that images display with proper dimensions and aspect ratios.

Verify that the Products page correctly displays ProductCard components with the new category-specific fallback images when product images are unavailable. Test that all category filters still work correctly and that fallback images render appropriately for each product category.
